verses.verse: Why do you boast<WH1984> of mischief,<WH7451> mighty<WH1368> man?<WH410> God's loving kindness<WH2617> endures continually.<WH3117>
Your tongue<WH3956> plots<WH2803> destruction,<WH1942> like a sharp<WH3913> razor,<WH8593> working<WH6213> deceitfully.<WH7423>
You love<WH157> evil<WH7451> more than good,<WH2896> lying<WH8267> rather than speaking<WH1696> the truth.<WH6664> Selah.<WH5542>
You love<WH157> all devouring<WH1105> words,<WH1697> you deceitful<WH4820> tongue.<WH3956>

God<WH410> will likewise destroy<WH5422> you forever.<WH5331> He will take you up,<WH2846> and pluck you out<WH5255> of your tent,<WH168> and root you out<WH8327> of the land<WH776> of the living.<WH2416> Selah.<WH5542>
The righteous<WH6662> also will see<WH7200> it,<WH3372> and fear, and laugh at him,<WH7832> saying,

"Behold,<WH1397> this is the man who didn't<WH7760> make God<WH430> his strength,<WH4581> but trusted<WH982> in the abundance<WH7230> of his riches,<WH6239> and strengthened<WH5810> himself in his wickedness.<WH1942>"
But as for me,<WH7488> I am like a green olive tree<WH2132> in God<WH430>'s house.<WH1004> I trust<WH982> in God<WH430>'s loving kindness<WH2617> forever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>
I will give you thanks<WH3034> forever,<WH5769> because you have done<WH6213> it.<WH6960> I will hope in your name,<WH8034> for it is good,<WH2896> in the presence of your saints.<WH2623>
